sentence.Network_en: Peter drove jerkily, cornering too fast and fumbling the gears.
sentence.Network_cn: 彼得转弯太急，换挡不利索，车开得一颠一颠的。

sentence.Network_en: Using his stick heavily, he moved jerkily towards the car.
sentence.Network_cn: 他费力地拄着拐杖，一瘸一拐地着向汽车走去。

sentence.Network_en: He began walking jerkily up and down, evidently unable to keep still.
sentence.Network_cn: 他开始来回走动, 不能安静下来.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 以j开头的英语英文单词 ... jeremiad 长篇声讨文字，哀叹 jerkily 颠簸地 jerky 急动的.
美国大学翻译中文52_书面语语_DuSystem... ... 猝倒症 cataplexy 猝然一停地 jerkily 猞猁 lynx.
to move jerkily or spasmodically .不稳地或断续地动
To move abruptly or jerkily ., 迅速移动迅速或很急地运动.

entry.tran: 突然的；急促的；颠簸的；不平稳的
entry.def: Jerky movements are very sudden and quick, and do not flow smoothly.

example.ex: Mr Griffin made a jerky gesture.
example.tran: 格里芬先生急匆匆地做了个手势。

sentences.sentence: "the mouth was slightly open, and jerked violently and spasmodically at one corner"
"She rose stiffly, jerkily from the window seat"

auth_sentence.content: Jerkily, the Government is moving from formulation to implementation.
auth_sentence.res_content: Jerkily, the Government is moving from formulation to implementation.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Jerkily, the Government is moving from formulation to implementation.

auth_sentence.content: The riffing is single-minded, but the structure is jerkily funky, or maybe funkily jerky.
auth_sentence.res_content: The riffing is single-minded, but the structure is jerkily funky, or maybe funkily jerky.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The riffing is single-minded, but the structure is jerkily funky, or maybe funkily jerky.

auth_sentence.content: He owned no car in New York, so he did all of the driving, jerkily and too fast.
auth_sentence.res_content: He owned no car in New York, so he did all of the driving, jerkily and too fast.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: He owned no car in New York, so he did all of the driving, jerkily and too fast.
